AI Description: qtlseq is a software tool for mapping and identifying quantitative trait loci (QTL) from next-generation sequencing data. It is specifically designed for the analysis of data from populations with low levels of linkage disequilibrium, such as the F2 populations.
Core Features:
1. Mapping and identifying quantitative trait loci (QTL) from next-generation sequencing data
2. Analysis of data from populations with low levels of linkage disequilibrium
3. Designed for F2 populations
General Tags: Qtl Mapping, Next-Generation Sequencing, Linkage Disequilibrium
